title: Further tighten Solo Mode startup latency and loading UX

requirements.text: Reduce perceived and actual Solo startup latency by tightening the Solo readiness fallback path so the UI reaches the playable terminal state with fewer delays when `startMatchAndGetLobby` returns a lobby that is not yet ready (active + non-null currentChallenge). This includes tuning the bounded retry/backoff delays used by Solo readiness polling to favor faster early retries while remaining within the overall Solo init timeout.

quotes: Version 17 is live â€” can you try Solo again and see if the loading feels any quicker now? If it still hesitates, I can tighten it further.

acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to /solo, if `startMatchAndGetLobby` returns a lobby that is not ready, the subsequent readiness polling attempts occur with tighter early delays than the current default (100ms, 200ms, 400ms, ...), improving time-to-ready in common transient-delay cases.
The readiness polling remains bounded (no infinite loops) and respects the overall Solo initialization timeout (currently defined in `frontend/src/utils/soloInitProgress.ts`).
Solo Mode still transitions to `INITIALIZATION_FAILED` with Retry/Back controls if the lobby never becomes ready within the configured bounds/timeout.

requirements.text: Improve the Solo initialization loading UX messaging so progress feels more responsive during slower startups: display phase-specific English progress text and include elapsed time during `INITIALIZING_SOLO_MODE` to reassure users the game is still working while polling for readiness.

quotes: see if the loading feels any quicker now

acceptanceCriteria: During Solo initialization (loading state), the UI shows the current phase message (creating/starting/loading) and also shows elapsed time since initialization started in clear English (e.g., "Elapsed: 3 seconds").
The elapsed-time display updates while initialization is in progress and disappears once the terminal is ready or the error state is shown.
All user-facing text added/changed for this improvement is in English.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not modify immutable hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
nonGoals: Do not change backend canister APIs or Motoko logic as part of this request.
Do not add new gameplay features, challenges, or multiplayer changes.
